definition: to send out/to show (one's feeling)/to issue/to develop/to make a bundle of money/classifier for gunshots (rounds)
to scald/to burn (by scalding)/to blanch (cooking)/to heat (sth) up in hot water/to perm/to iron/scalding hot

sentences.english: I have had burning or pain when I urinates.
sentences.chinese: 我小便时感到发烫和疼痛。

sentences.english: Your skin is pale, but you're hot all over.
sentences.chinese: 你脸色苍白，但是你全身发烫。

sentences.english: Palm trees and pillared arcades cast shadows over the burning pavements.
sentences.chinese: 棕榈树和圆柱连环拱廊的阴影投在发烫的人行道上。

sentences.english: Heat quickly penetrated the cotton and began to roast my hand.
sentences.chinese: 棉纱上的温度很快上来了，我的手也开始发烫。

sentences.english: When he managed to create his own spaces, Kobe was likewise dropping bombs.
sentences.chinese: 当他可以为自己找到投篮空间时，科比的手热得发烫。
脸红，脸颊发烫，手心出汗。

sentences.english: He has had burning or pain when he urinates.
sentences.chinese: 他小便时感应发烫和痛苦悲伤。

sentences.english: The nurse mopped his fevered brow.
sentences.chinese: 护士擦拭了他发烫的前额。

sentences.english: Her forehead was flushed with fever.
sentences.chinese: 她的前额由于发烧而发烫。

sentences.english: The hot dry earth drank up the rain.
sentences.chinese: 干旱发烫的土地把雨水全吸光了。

sentences.english: The passionate river is going endlessly.
Our folk medicine didn't even have half-measures to offer.
sentences.chinese: 棉纱上的温度很快上来了，我的手也开始发烫。

sentences.english: Tongs and Shovels are available to handle hot parts and Trays.
sentences.chinese: 钳和铁锹可应用于发烫的零件和托盘。

sentences.english: Their faces burned in the wind.
sentences.chinese: 他们的脸被风吹得发烫。

definition: burning hot/fiery/to have one's hair permed with hot curling tongs
to blush/to redden (with shame, indignation etc)
to ache/to be sore/to feel painful
very red/red through and through/to blush (deep red)
to weaken/to go soft (at the knees)
